description: \"These birds accompany me on my travels, either out of partnership or perhaps in anticipation of my demise.\"

description: \"Why would anyone want this?\"
name: Used Loin Cloth

description: \"A pair of Yaka's limited run of 'Yakeezy' sneakers.\"
name: Yaka's Sneakers

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> Even beaten to a pulp, they will find a way to rise once more.
name: Sylvan Grimoire

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> Watchers take on a variety of forms across the realms. This one was particularly unfortunate.
name: Watcher Runt

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> \"On the Many Passages Between the Worlds and the Planes\"
name: Book of Gates

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> If neither spear nor arrow could stop it, how could a pinch of salt have done it?
name: Song of Dodourn

description: Grants <hyperlink>First Strike</hyperlink>.
name: Daybreak Gauntlets

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> Much to her priests' chagrin, Sola's prophecies were terrifying rather than edifying.
name: Revelations of Sola

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> The beast needs only the sight of the hook to know its master's will.
name: Karavar's Goad

description: <runicfont>Lore</runicfont> A favourite of the wardens of Tharru'Cath, this is a cruel weapon by any measure.
name: Umbral Culverin
